Title: Prohibits law enforcement officers from using bias-based profiling
Summary: Prohibits police officers from using bias-based profiling; requires that a procedure be established for the taking and review of complaints against police officers for bias-based profiling; allows an action for injunctive relief and/or damages to be brought against a law enforcement agency, any agent of a law enforcement agency and the supervisor of an agent.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to bias-based profiling
